alert.note: Alert for Madison (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Madison County through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Paoli, or near Danielsville, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Comer and Paoli. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
